                        The all-in-one animation tool for       
                    professionals and digital artists! Anime    
                    Studio Pro 6 is perfect for professionals   
                   looking for a more efficient alternative to  
                      tedious frame-by-frame detailing when     
                          creating quality animations.          
                                                                
                     With an intuitive interface loaded with    
                      pre-rigged characters and additional      
                   content, Anime Studio Pro delivers advanced  
                     animation tools and effects to speed up    
                      your workflow. Anime Studio combines      
                       cutting-edge features with powerful      
                      technology to deliver the most unique     
                     animation program for digital artists.     
                   Resize your images with no loss in quality   
                     using Anime Studio's vector-based layer    
                   system. Also, using the bone rigging system  
                     you can add a skeleton to any image by     
                    simple point and click, then bring it to    
                                     life!                      
                                                                
                         Create Professional Animations         
                    With powerful vector based drawing tools    
                   and the ability to import scanned drawings   
                       and images, you can create your own      
                 characters and objects in Anime Studio Pro 6.  
                                                                
                   Integrated Lip Synching Lip-Synching is now  
                      possible with the integration of the      
                    powerful AST Production Synch libraries,    
                   giving you versatility and accurate lip and  
                                mouth movements.                
                                                                
                    Unlimited Professional Output - Output to   
                    formats including NTSC/PAL D1/DV Standard   
                      and Widescreen; HDV and HDTV 780p and     
                        1080p; AVI, MOV, Flash and more.        
                                                                
                     Powerful Animation and Creation Tools -    
                     Improved bone-rigging and drawing tools    
                      make character creation and animation     
                    easier than ever. Save time with the new    
                    Auto weld and path-close features, vastly   
                      improved text and AdobeÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® IllustratorÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â®     
                    import, and improved vector-based drawing   
                                     tools.                     
                                                                
                    Advanced Compositing - Anime Studio's new   
                   Sequencer makes it easy to visually arrange  
                      and edit all project components. Add      
                     multiple soundtracks and sound effects,    
                    composite video, images and animation and   
                                   pan audio.                   
                                                                
                   Anime Studio Pro is Versatile and Powerful:  
                                                                
                     Extensive Content Library - Anime Studio   
                   Pro includes many exclusive, royalty-free,   
                   vector-based characters and props, as well   
                           as stock video and images.           
                      3D Capabilities - Blend 2D and 3D with    
                   Anime Studio Pro. Easily import and orient   
                       textured OBJs from your favorite 3D      
                  applications such as Poser and Poser Pro.     
                       Import Your Art - With vector-based      
                     drawing tools and the ability to import    
                   scanned drawings and images, you can create  
                        your own characters and objects.        
                     Bring Photos to Life - Give life to your   
                     favorite photos. Import digital camera     
                    images, attach bones and easily turn your   
                        photographs into animated movies.
